VARDESC: Doctors who do medical research care only about what is best for each patient.
Medical researchers treat people like \guinea pigs.\""
It's safe to be in a medical research study.
Some doctors do medical research for selfish reasons.
Doctors tell their patients everything they need to know about being in a research study.
A doctor would never ask me to be in a medical research study if the doctor thought there was any chance it might harm me.
There are some things about medical research that I do not trust at all.
A doctor would never recommend something that is not the best treatment, just so he or she can study how it works.
Medical researchers have no selfish reasons for doing research studies.
Medical researchers do not tell people everything they really need to know about being in a research study.
The only reason doctors do medical research is to help people.
I completely trust doctors who do medical research.
